valid: For the period 12:00 (UTC) on Sun 14 Dec 2025 to 12:00 (UTC) on Mon 15 Dec 2025
general_synopsis: Atlantic low 961 moving rather quickly east, expected 150 miles west of Bailey 968 by 0600 tomorrow
